hero.title: Built for serious lifters
hero.subtitle: No frills. No gimmicks. Just iron, chalk, and people who are serious about getting strong. Olympic lifting platforms, competition-grade equipment, and a community of lifters who push each other to be better every day.

about.title: Welcome to Iron Forge
about.subtitle: Where lifters become legends
about.content: Since 2012, Iron Forge has been the home for serious strength athletes, powerlifters, Olympic weightlifters, and anyone who wants to get objectively stronger. We have the best equipment, experienced coaches, and a no-judgment atmosphere where hard work is respected.

products.name: Open Gym Access
products.description: Unlimited gym access 24/7. All equipment, all the time. Perfect for self-directed training.

products.name: Strength Coaching
products.description: 1-on-1 coaching sessions. Custom programming, technique work, and accountability.

products.name: Powerlifting Program
products.description: 12-week periodized program for squat, bench, and deadlift. Includes open gym access.

products.name: Olympic Lifting
products.description: Learn the snatch and clean & jerk from certified USAW coaches. Technical and powerful.

products.name: Competition Prep
products.description: 8-week prep for powerlifting or weightlifting meets. Includes programming and meet-day coaching.

products.name: Drop-In
products.description: Single day pass. Train at one of the best-equipped gyms around.

items.text: Added 100lbs to my deadlift in 6 months. The equipment and coaching at Iron Forge are second to none. Best gym I've ever trained at.
items.author: Mike Johnson
items.title: Powerlifter

items.text: Finally learned proper Olympic lifting technique. Competed in my first meet and hit PRs on both lifts. Couldn't have done it without the coaches here.
items.author: Alex Chen
items.title: Weightlifter

items.text: The community here is incredible. Everyone is supportive and the gym has everything you need to get strong. Worth every penny.
items.author: Sarah Martinez
items.title: Strength Athlete

members.name: Marcus Steel
members.title: Head Coach & Owner
members.bio: Former competitive powerlifter with a 1800lb total. 15+ years coaching experience. CSCS certified and passionate about building strong athletes.

steps.title: Tour the Gym
steps.description: Stop by anytime to see our facility and meet the members

steps.title: Choose Your Path
steps.description: Select open gym access, coaching, or a specific program

steps.title: Start Training
steps.description: Get your access key and begin your strength journey

steps.title: Track Progress
steps.description: Log lifts, hit PRs, and watch yourself get stronger

contact.title: Visit Iron Forge
contact.subtitle: Come see what serious training looks like
contact.address: 567 Industrial Way, Warehouse District, Denver, CO 80202
